name: plastic_wine_glass
description: CreativeWare 12oz. Acrylic Wine Glass - Clear. This wine glass is the perfect addition to your party. Clear, sturdy, and elegent, your guests will enjoy their drink of choice in style. For some celebrations, glass-breaking is a must. For all others, the must is this CreativeWare 12oz. Acrylic Wine Glass - Clear. Crafted with durable clear acrylic material that can withstand bumps and drops, this product is ideal for casual or outdoor gatherings. The classic shape is great for serving both white and red wines.
